query:
SELECT 
    poi.id,
    poi.pickingOrderId,
    poi.productId,
    p.sku AS productSku,
    poi.requestedQuantity,
    poi.inventoryId,
    i.batch AS lot,
    wl.code AS addressCode
FROM pickingOrderItems poi
LEFT JOIN products p ON poi.productId = p.id
LEFT JOIN inventory i ON poi.inventoryId = i.id
LEFT JOIN warehouseLocations wl ON i.locationId = wl.id
JOIN pickingOrders po ON poi.pickingOrderId = po.id
WHERE po.orderNumber = 'PED-1771897309625-7P EVL'
ORDER BY poi.productId, i.batch;
